rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Staunch Shield[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if Dedue, Taciturn Devotee, did not attack this turn, him and up to one target Noble gain indestructible until your next turn.
[i]Defiant Defense[/i] – Whenever Dedue blocks, if you have 10 or less life, all damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to Dedue instead.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{W}
